text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ¡Ja! ¡Lo hice! ¡Ganó! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Je, ahora puedo...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...No fui lo suficientemente rápido.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Mayano! Great job! You were totally<n>amazing on
that last stretch!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...¿Viniste a verme correr?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: ¡Sí! Por supuesto que vendría a apoyarte<n>—

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Entonces, ¿puedes decirme algo?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
What's the next race Brian is gonna be<n>in? You
definitely know, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Bueno, seré... Aún no has tenido suficiente,<n>¿eh?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Por supuesto que no. Es como...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't feel the sting of defeat. If<n>anything,
I'd say she's feeling sad.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...Y eso es terrible. Si vamos a<n>correr...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Quiero ser tan brillante que pique.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: ...Entiendo.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I remember the first time I met her. Even<n>though
she had just finished a race, she<n>seemed hungry
for more—like it wasn't<n>enough.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Fine, I'll tell you. I've got a hunch it's<n>gonna be
the spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm fairly certain she wants to compete<n>against
the best racers.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
She probably saw the Hanshin Daishoten<n>as the
best route to get there.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The spring Tenno Sho—a<n>well-established
long-distance race for<n>top-class racers.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer.
choice_data_list: Entendido. Vamos al Tenno Sho de primavera.
Entendido. Vamos al Tenno Sho de primavera.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ¡Entendido!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Je.. Ustedes dos son algo.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: ¡Vaya, ya he llegado demasiado lejos para echarme atrás ahora!<n>Supongo que me uniré.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Mayano, cuando regresemos, vamos a<n>entrenar
¡hasta que me supliques que pare! ¡Espero<n>que estés lista!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ¡Jeje! ¡Por supuesto! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Y así, fijamos nuestra mirada en el<n>Tenno Sho de
primavera!
